## Description {#details}

It is a visitor for <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-safepointirverifier-cpp-/gcptrtracker/#aaaee927f8ed0e14bcb32091411cffe66">GCPtrTracker::verifyFunction</a>.

It decides if the instruction (which uses heap reference) is legal or not, given our safepoint semantics.

Definition at line 532 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/safepointirverifier-cpp">SafepointIRVerifier.cpp</a>.
